co.cask.cdap.api.messaging

Interface MessageFetcher


  • @Beta
public interface MessageFetcher
    Provides access to fetch messages from the transactional messaging system.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CloseableIterator<Message> fetch(String namespace, String topic, int limit, long timestamp)
      Fetch messages from the given topic that was published on or after the given timestamp.
      CloseableIterator<Message> fetch(String namespace, String topic, int limit, String afterMessageId)
      Fetch messages from the given topic that was published after a message, identified by the given message id.

    • Method Detail

      • fetch

        CloseableIterator<Message> fetch(String namespace,
                               String topic,
                               int limit,
                               long timestamp)
                                 throws TopicNotFoundException,
                                        IOException
        Fetch messages from the given topic that was published on or after the given timestamp.
        Parameters:
        namespace - namespace of the topic
        topic - name of the topic
        limit - maximum number of messages to fetch
        timestamp - timestamp in milliseconds; the publish timestamp of the first Message returned by the resulting CloseableIterator will be on or after the given timestamp. Use timestamp = 0 to poll from the first available message.
        Returns:
        a CloseableIterator of Message
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the topic name is invalid. A valid id should only contain alphanumeric characters and _ or -.
        IOException - if failed to communicate with the messaging system
        TopicNotFoundException - if the give topic doesn't exist

      • fetch

        CloseableIterator<Message> fetch(String namespace,
                               String topic,
                               int limit,
                               @Nullable
                               String afterMessageId)
                                 throws TopicNotFoundException,
                                        IOException
        Fetch messages from the given topic that was published after a message, identified by the given message id.
        Parameters:
        namespace - namespace of the topic
        topic - name of the topic
        limit - maximum number of messages to fetch
        afterMessageId - message id returned from the Message.getId() method via some prior call to one of the pollMessages methods. If it is null, it will fetch from the first available message.
        Returns:
        a CloseableIterator of Message
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the topic name is invalid. A valid id should only contain alphanumeric characters and _ or -.
        IOException - if failed to communicate with the messaging system
        TopicNotFoundException - if the give topic doesn't exist
